005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.HashSet;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Set;
024import java.util.stream.Collectors;
025import java.util.stream.IntStream;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029/**
030 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
031 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>
032 * function.
033 */
034public final class ArrayRemove {
035  private static final String NAME = "remove";
036  @NonNull
037  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
038      .name(NAME)
039      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
040      .deterministic()
041      .contextIndependent()
042      .focusIndependent()
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("array")
045          .type(IArrayItem.type())
046          .one()
047          .build())
048      .argument(IArgument.builder()
049          .name("positions")
050          .type(IIntegerItem.type())
051          .zeroOrMore()
052          .build())
053      .returnType(IArrayItem.type())
054      .returnOne()
055      .functionHandler(ArrayRemove::execute)
056      .build();
057
058  private ArrayRemove() {
059    // disable construction
060  }
061
062  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
063  @NonNull
064  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
065      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
066      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
067      IItem focus) {
068    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
069        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
070    ISequence<? extends IIntegerItem> positions = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
071
072    return ISequence.of(removeItems(array, positions));
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
077   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>.
078   *
079   * @param <T>
080   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
081   * @param array
082   *          the target Metapath array
083   * @param positions
084   *          the integer position of the items to remove
085   * @return a new array containing the modification
086   * @throws ArrayException
087   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
088   */
089  @NonNull
090  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> removeItems(
091      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
092      @NonNull Collection<? extends IIntegerItem> positions) {
093    return remove(
094        array,
095        ObjectUtils.notNull(positions.stream()
096            .map(position -> position.asInteger().intValueExact())
097            .collect(Collectors.toSet())));
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
102   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>.
103   *
104   * @param <T>
105   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
106   * @param array
107   *          the target Metapath array
108   * @param positions
109   *          the integer position of the items to remove
110   * @return a new array containing the modification
111   * @throws ArrayException
112   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
113   */
114  @NonNull
115  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> remove(
116      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
117      @NonNull Collection<Integer> positions) {
118    Set<Integer> positionSet = positions instanceof Set ? (Set<Integer>) positions : new HashSet<>(positions);
119
120    List<T> remaining = ObjectUtils.notNull(IntStream.range(1, array.size() + 1)
121        .filter(index -> !positionSet.contains(index))
122        .mapToObj(index -> array.get(index - 1))
123        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
124
125    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(remaining);
126  }
127}
